requirementText.name: Agent type
requirementText.description: The mandatory agent element MUST have the @TYPE attribute with the value "OTHER".

testCase.description: The mets/metsHdr/agent with @ROLE='CREATOR' MUST have: - mets/metsHdr/agent/@TYPE MUST exist. - mets/metsHdr/agent/@TYPE MUST have the value 'OTHER'.

rule.description: For the CSIP mandatory agent element, mets/metsHdr/agent/@TYPE MUST exist.

error.message: The CSIP mandatory agent element (i.e. mets/metsHdr/agent[@ROLE='CREATOR']) mets/metsHdr/agent/@TYPE attribute does not exist. MUST be: attribute exists and has the value 'OTHER'.

package.name: mets-xml_metsHdr_agent_TYPE_not_exist

rule.description: For the CSIP mandatory agent element, mets/metsHdr/agent/@TYPE MUST have the value 'OTHER'.

error.message: The CSIP mandatory agent element (i.e. mets/metsHdr/agent[@ROLE='CREATOR']) mets/metsHdr/agent/@TYPE has incorrect value. MUST be: attribute exists and has the value 'OTHER'.
